column5: Tonight was the stag and doe in honour of my fiancee and myself.  One of the "fundraisers" was a fishbowl with two dace inside.  The rules were simple... change would be placed within the fishbowl until the water overflowed the bowl at which point, in a most climactic fashion, the groom would consume the minnows found within (this was DEFINITELY not a fundraiser conceived by me)...  Hours later I noticed that one of the  two minnows had met it's untimely demise. I was not too keen on eating a stanky minnow.  At this point, like any true brother would, a friend stepped forth to heroically eat the bloated and dead minnow, saving me from certain gagging.  As the water overflowed, we brothers bound by cyprinidae swallowed the beasts with a swig of domestic beer...good times were had by all!  This post is not P(eat)A certified.
pics to follow if you found this amusing.
Hahaha.....we did the same sort of thing at mine, but we raced them first...... LOL!!  I ate them alive too  S.
you know you're a fisherman when...
When your still partying after 2:30 am and not sitting behind this box on your jack and jill night?
Thats totally disgusting...yes, pics are required
